title: WTB: Kaiser Wilhelm hands at chest STAMP with Meriden CT
author: Joshchisox08

posts.post_title: WTB: Kaiser Wilhelm hands at chest STAMP with Meriden CT
posts.post_content:
I know this is a long shot but then again people from here are all over eBay items. About a month or a month and a half ago there was a listing on eBay with a Kaiser Wilhelm hands at chest. On the back it was stamped Meriden CT. 

I'm from CT and my dad was bidding on that card. I would like to see if any of you got the card and would be willing to sell or trade for it ? Again maybe this is a long shot maybe not. I was thinking of maybe giving it to him for a Birthday gift even though I already bought us tickets to go see Alice in Chains..........
Have you reached out to the seller in an effort to see if he/she was willing to reach out to the buyer for you?
I haven't but that's a good idea.
AiC tickets is an awesome gift!  Good job Josh!

Haha thanks Luke ! Me and the old man love AIC \m/\m/

P.S. Just noticed my dad bought a SL'er off of you on eBay haha.
Also, i forgot to mention :  there are other cards with that Edgar Frazier Meriden CT back stamp.  I've owned one (don't have it anymore) and have heard of others.
I have know idea what the stamps are or how you determine whose stamp it is lol. It's just Meriden CT that is our connection.
Look at the back scan of the card you're talking about.  It was stamped by a collector named Edgar Frazier.
That's the problem my dad deleted it from his eBay account so I can't anymore =(
